label: TIU FIELD EDITOR CLASSES
name: TIU FIELD EDITOR CLASSES
value_help: Enter the User Class you which to give Template Field edit authority
instance_help: Enter a sequential number for identifying the user class
description: This parameter contains a list of ASU user classes who'smembers are allowed to edit template fields.

label: ORWRP REPORT LAB LIST
name: ORWRP REPORT LAB LIST
value_help: Select a Lab report
instance_help: Enter the sequence in which the report should appear on Labs Tab
description: This parameter allows a custom list of reports, with sequencing, on theLabs tab.

label: ORWCV1 COVERSHEET LIST
name: ORWCV1 COVERSHEET LIST
value_help: Select a report for the coversheet
instance_help: Enter the sequence in which the report should appear on the Cover Sheet
description: This parameter allows a custom view of the Cover sheet in the CPRS Gui.

label: OR ORDER TEXT CONVERSION
name: OR ORDER TEXT CONVERSION
value_help: Enter the number of the order just processed in the conversion.
description: This parameter tracks the progress of the Order Text conversion job,queued off by the post-init for patch OR*3*92.

label: GMRC CONSULT LIST DAYS
name: GMRC CONSULT LIST DAYS
value_help: Enter the number of days you wish to gather Consults for.
description: This parameter is used to allow a site to set the number of days that will be searched backwards for a Consult to be associated with a NOTE.  A default parameter of 365 days will be set at the Package Level.

label: ORQQPX REMINDER FOLDERS
name: ORQQPX REMINDER FOLDERS
value_help: Visible Folders - D=Due, A=Applicable, N=Not Applicable, E=Evaluated, O=Other
description: This parameter is used and set by the CPRS GUI.  Each letter representsa reminder folder that is visible in the reminders tree.

label: PSB IVPB COLUMN WIDTHS
name: PSB IVPB COLUMN WIDTHS
value_help: entry is made automatically based on changes to the IVPB columns
description: This paramater is set by the users adjusting the IVPB column widthIt is stored in the format nnn/nnn/nnn/nnn/nnn/nnn/nnn/nnn/nnn.

label: ORQQPX DEFAULT LOCATIONS
name: ORQQPX DEFAULT LOCATIONS
value_help: Enter a text default location, or a pointer to the INSTITUTION FILE (#4)
instance_help: Enter the display order of the default location
description: Returns a list of default outside locations for display in a reminder dialog.

label: ORWPCE ANYTIME ENCOUNTERS
name: ORWPCE ANYTIME ENCOUNTERS
value_help: Allow Encounters at anytime (without a note being edited)
description: Allows encounter data to be entered at any time, even when a note is notbeing edited.

label: ORQQPX REMINDER TEXT AT CURSOR
name: ORQQPX REMINDER TEXT AT CURSOR
value_help: Insert Reminder Dialog Generated Text at Cursor Location
description: Allows text generated by a reminder dialog, when processing a reminder,to be inserted at the current cursor location instead of at the bottomof the note.

label: TIU TEMPLATE REMINDER DIALOGS
name: TIU TEMPLATE REMINDER DIALOGS
value_help: Enter Reminder Dialogs that can be used as a Template
instance_help: Enter Sequence Number of Reminder Dialog
description: Contains Reminder Dialogs that are allowed to be used as TIU Templates.This parameter is different than most others in that each level iscumulative, so all Reminder Dialogs at the System, Division, Serviceand User levels can be used in Templates.

label: PXRM REPORT TEMPLATE (USER)
name: PXRM REPORT TEMPLATE (USER)
value_help: Enter the Reminder Template available in Reminder Reports.
instance_help: Enter a sequential number to identify the report template.
description: Returns a list of Reminder Report Templates that are allowed for auser.

label: ORQQPX NEW REMINDER PARAMS
name: ORQQPX NEW REMINDER PARAMS
value_help: Use New Reminder Cover Sheet Parameters (0=No, 1=Yes)
description: Indicates if the New Cover Sheet reminders should be used.

label: ORQQPX COVER SHEET REMINDERS
name: ORQQPX COVER SHEET REMINDERS
instance_help: Enter the sequential number used for sequencing
description: This parameter is cumulative, so sequence ranges should be assigned.Values are in the form of FlagTypeIEN, where Flag indicatesL:Lock, R:Remove or N:Normal, Type is a 'C' or 'R', indicatingthat # is the internal entry number of a Category or a Reminder.

label: TIU TEMPLATE PERSONAL OBJECTS
name: TIU TEMPLATE PERSONAL OBJECTS
value_help: Enter the Patient Data Objects allowed in Personal Templates
instance_help: Sequence Number
description: Contains TIU Objects that are allowed in the Insert Patient Data Objectdialog of the Templates Editor, when adding objects to personaltemplates.  This parameter is cummulative at all levels.  If no objectsare entered in this parameter, all objects will be allowed.

label: ORWPCE DISABLE AUTO CHECKOUT
name: ORWPCE DISABLE AUTO CHECKOUT
value_help: Disable checkout of encounters without DX/CPT/Provider Information
description: Disables the automatic checkout of encounters that do not have adiagnosis, procedure or provider information.

label: ORWPCE DISABLE AUTO VISIT TYPE
name: ORWPCE DISABLE AUTO VISIT TYPE
value_help: Disable automatic selection of Visit Type
description: When set to Yes, this parameter prevents the automatic selectionof a Type of Visit on the Visit Tab of the encounter form.

label: ORQQPX COVER SHEET REM CLASSES
name: ORQQPX COVER SHEET REM CLASSES
display_text: Cover Sheet Reminders by User Class
instance_help: User Class for Cover Sheet Reminder List
description: This parameter works in conjunction with the ORQQPX COVER SHEET REMINDERS parameter, acting as another level tothe cumulative parameter of User Class, inserted between the User andLocation Levels.  Each line of the Value word processing field represents a different reminder or category, and is in the formatSequence;FlagTypeIEN, where Flag indicates L:Lock, R:Remove or N:Normal, Type is a 'C' or 'R', indicating that # is the internal entry number of a Category or a Reminder.

label: GMRC IFC BACKGROUND FINISH
name: GMRC IFC BACKGROUND FINISH
display_text: Finish time of IFC Background job
value_help: Enter a date/time
description: This parameter holds the date/time that the Inter-facility Consults background job last finished running. The parameter is set by the background job.  This parameter is not intended to be modified usingparameter tools. If this parameter becomes delinquent for an extended period, IRM personnelwill be alerted that the job is overdue.

label: GMRC IFC BACKGROUND START
name: GMRC IFC BACKGROUND START
display_text: Start date/time of IFC background job
value_help: You must enter a date/time no more than 4 days in the future.
value_validation_code: N %DT S %DT="T" D ^%DT I Y,Y>$$FMADD^XLFDT(DT,4) K X
description: This parameter contains the last start date/time of the Inter-facility Consults background job.   This parameter will help the system know whether a sufficient amount of time has passed since the last run.  If this parameter is set to afuture date/time, the background job will not run until that date /time.  The parameter may only be set up to 4 days in the future.

label: ORK CONTRAST MEDIA CREATININE
name: ORK CONTRAST MEDIA CREATININE
value_help: Enter the number of days to check for most recent creatinine results.
description: The number of days to look back in time for patient's most recent labserum creatinine results when Imaging procedures using contrast media areordered.  This value is used in the Biochem Abnormality for Contrast Mediaorder check.

label: ORWPCE EXCLUDE IMMUNIZATIONS
name: ORWPCE EXCLUDE IMMUNIZATIONS
value_help: Enter the Immunization you wish to exclude from the Encounter Form Lookup
instance_help: Sequence Number
description: This parameter contains immunizations that are excluded from the listof Other Immunizations displayed in the Encounter Form.

label: ORWPCE EXCLUDE SKIN TESTS
name: ORWPCE EXCLUDE SKIN TESTS
value_help: Enter the Skin Test you wish to exclude from the Encounter Form Lookup
instance_help: Sequence Number
description: This parameter contains skin tests that are excluded from the listof Other Skin Tests displayed in the Encounter Form.

label: ORWPCE EXCLUDE PATIENT ED
name: ORWPCE EXCLUDE PATIENT ED
value_help: Enter the Patient Education Topic you want to exclude from Encounter Form Lookup
instance_help: Sequence Number
description: This parameter contains patient education topics that are excluded fromthe list of Other Education Topics displayed in the Encounter Form.

label: ORWPCE EXCLUDE HEALTH FACTORS
name: ORWPCE EXCLUDE HEALTH FACTORS
value_help: Enter the Health Factor you want to exclude from the Encounter Form Lookup
instance_help: Sequence Number
description: This parameter contains health factors that are excluded from the listof Other Health Factors displayed in the Encounter Form.

label: ORWPCE EXCLUDE EXAMS
name: ORWPCE EXCLUDE EXAMS
value_help: Enter the Exam you want to exclude from the Encounter Form Lookup
instance_help: Sequence Number
description: This parameter contains exams that are excluded from the listof Other Exams displayed in the Encounter Form.

label: ORB ERASE ALL
name: ORB ERASE ALL
display_text: Access to erase all my alerts option
value_help: Enter 'yes' to allow the user to erase all their notifications.
description: 'Yes' indicates the user can erase all their notifications/alerts.

label: EC HFS SCRATCH
name: EC HFS SCRATCH
value_help: Enter a valid HFS Directory
description: Name of the HFS directory that all Event Capture processes will be able toaccess through ^%ZISH for printing documents.

label: ORWOR SHOW SURGERY TAB
name: ORWOR SHOW SURGERY TAB
value_help: Should the Surgery tab be shown in the GUI? ((0=No, 1=Yes)
description: Should the Surgery tab be shown in the GUI? ((0=No, 1=Yes)

label: GMRC RETAIN IFC ACTIVITY DAYS
name: GMRC RETAIN IFC ACTIVITY DAYS
display_text: Days to retain complete IFC transactions
value_help: Enter the number of days (7-180) to retain completed transactions
description: This parameter controls the number of days that completed Inter-facility Consult transactions are maintained in the IFC MESSAGE LOG (#123.6) file. Completed transactions represent Consult activities transmitted to aremote facility via HL7 which have been responded to with no error condition.

label: ORB LAB > THRESHOLD
name: ORB LAB > THRESHOLD
value_help: Enter the lab threshold value.
instance_help: Lab test;Specimen sends alert above threshold.
description: This parameter permits users to set Lab test result threshold values thatdetermine if an alert is sent to them. If a lab test's result is greaterthan the threshold value, the Lab Threshold Exceeded notification/alert istriggered. The Instance (Lab Test;Specimen) must be entered in the formatLab Test #;Specimen #.   Lab Test # is the internal entry number fromthe LABORATORY TEST file [#60]. Specimen # is the internal entry numberfrom the TOPOGRAPHY FIELD file [#61].

label: ORWRP TIME_OCC LIMITS INDV
name: ORWRP TIME/OCC LIMITS INDV
value_help: Format: Start date;End date;Occurrence limit (T-100;T;100)
instance_help: Enter report to specify time & occurrence
description: This parameter sets the default time and occurrence limits for reportsfound on the Reports and Labs Tabs in CPRS.

label: ORWRP TIME_OCC LIMITS ALL
name: ORWRP TIME/OCC LIMITS ALL
value_help: Format: Start Date;End Date;Occurrence limit (T-100;T;200)
instance_help: Enter time & occurrence limit for all reports
description: This parameter sets a default for all reports found on the Reports Tabin CPRS.  Individual values of this parameter, for each report can beset by editing the parameter ORWRP TIME/OCC LIMITS INDV.

label: ORB LAB < THRESHOLD
name: ORB LAB < THRESHOLD
value_help: Enter the lab threshold value.
instance_help: Lab test:Specimen sends alert below threshold.
description: This parameter permits users to set Lab test result threshold values thatdetermine if an alert is sent to them. If a lab test's result is lessthan the threshold value, the Lab Threshold Exceeded notification/alert istriggered.  The Instance (Lab Test;Specimen) must be entered in the formatLab Test #;Specimen #.   Lab Test # is the internal entry number fromthe LABORATORY TEST file [#60]. Specimen # is the internal entry numberfrom the TOPOGRAPHY FIELD file [#61].

label: ORWCOM PATIENT SELECTED
name: ORWCOM PATIENT SELECTED
value_help: COM Object to Activate on Patient Selection
description: COM Object to Activate on CPRS GUI Patient Selection

label: ORWCOM ORDER ACCEPTED
name: ORWCOM ORDER ACCEPTED
value_help: COM Object to activate on order acceptance
instance_help: Order Display Group
description: COM Objects to activate on order acceptance

label: ORWCH COLUMNS REPORTS
name: ORWCH COLUMNS REPORTS
value_help: Enter the widths of the columns in the control (separate by commas).
description: This records the widths of each column on Reports Tab grids.  The columnwiths are entered from left to right and delimited by commas.  For example,"50,260,25,78,129".

label: ORWRP ADHOC LOOKUP
name: ORWRP ADHOC LOOKUP
value_help: Enter the type of lookup desired
description: This parameter determines the lookup used to populate the Adhoc Health Summary types in CPRS Report Tab, when an Adhoc report is requested.

label: ORB FORWARD BACKUP REVIEWER
name: ORB FORWARD BACKUP REVIEWER
display_text: Holds Days before Forward to Backup
value_help: Number of days to hold notif. before fwding to recipient's backup reviewer.
instance_help: The notification related to this forwarding period.
description: The number of days before a notification is forwarded to a recipient'sbackup alert reviewer. The maximum is 30 days.  If not indicated or zero,the notification will not be forwarded.  For example, if a notificationhas a value of 14 for this parameter, it will be forwarded to the backupreviewer of each recipient who hasn't processed the notification after 14days. Determination of recipients who have not processed the notificationand their backup alert reviewer is made by the Kernel Alert Utility.  Itwill not be forwarded to backup reviewers of recipients who haveprocessed the alert within 14 days.  If the value of this parameter iszero or non-existent, the  alert/notification will never be forwarded.

label: GMV GUI VERSION
name: GMV GUI VERSION
description: This parameter is used to store the application:versions that are compatiblewith the current server version of Vitals Measurements.  Instance formatis APPLICATION:VERSION  (example: VITALS.EXE:0.0.0.0).

label: GMV WEBLINK
name: GMV WEBLINK
description: This parameter contains the web address for the Vitals Measurments homepage.  This can be modified to a local address in the event that the pagesare downloaded to be displayed from a local server location or a site wishes to direct user to a local page instead of the national site.

label: GMV USER DEFAULTS
name: GMV USER DEFAULTS
description: This parameter is used to store a users default parameter settings.  Each setting is defined on the client as follows:   TGMV_UserSetting = (    usCanvasAbnormal,    usCanvasNormal);   GMVUSERSETTING: array[TGMV_UserSetting] of string = (                  'CanvasAbnormal',                   'CanvasNormal');

label: GMRC IFC ALERT IMMED ON PT ERR
name: GMRC IFC ALERT IMMED ON PT ERR
display_text: Alert CLIN group immed. on pt. err
description: This parameter controls whether the IFC CLIN ERRORS GROUP at the requesting site is notified immediately of patient information errors at the consulting site.  If set to yes, this group will be alerted every time an Unknown Patient error is returned from the consulting site. If set to No, this group is only notified if the problem is unresolved after5 re-transmissions.
